text: int main ( ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { int l , i = 1 , j , a , b [ 99 ] , c [ 99 ] , m = 0 ; scanf ( "%d%d" , & l , & a ) ; b [ 0 ] = c [ 0 ] = a ; for ( ; i < l ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a ) ; if ( j == 0 ) c [ 0 ] = a + b [ 0 ] ; else if ( j == i ) c [ i ] = a + b [ i - 1 ] ; else c [ j ] = a + ( ( b [ j ] >= b [ j - 1 ] ) ? b [ j ] : b [ j - 1 ] ) ; } for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) b [ j ] = c [ j ] ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < l ; i ++ ) if ( m < c [ i ] ) m = c [ i ] ; printf ( "%d\n" , m ) ; } return 0 ; }
